title: Headless WordPress Caching Playbook
summary: A practical cache strategy for WPGraphQL + Next.js: what to cache, where to purge, and how to avoid 500s.

body.raw:
## TL;DR
- Cache HTML at the edge for list pages.
- Cache GraphQL responses with SWR/React Query on the client.
- Purge selectively on post updates using webhooks.
